
```ruby
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"name":"xyz","email":"xyz@example.com"}' http://myrailsapp.dev/users
```


```bash
curl "http://mentor/admin/users/add?email=test@example.com&password=test123&name=testing&username=testing"
```


```http
GET /admin/users/add HTTP/1.1

Host: mentor

Content-Length: 57

Cache-Control: max-age=0

Accept-Language: en-US

Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1

Origin: http://mentor

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/126.0.6478.57 Safari/537.36

Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.7

Referer: http://mentor/login

Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br

Cookie: XSRF-%3D; mentor_%3D

Connection: keep-alive



email=test@test.com&username=test&password=test&name=test
```
